english.segment1: High. upon your. You display. Good traits though few. We found. During the long winter. This disease. Keeps holding me down
english.segment2: Try to run. When you're asleep. To imagine. This away. He said come. For your own high hell. And know this. You seem to be. To scared to run
english.segment4: Wish I had your faults. Nothing seems to phase you. Lies are much more than trust in me
english.segment5: I was hung. Up on you. 'Til the shadows. Begin to crawl. Some say. You can never know. Just how far down. This beast has come. To scared to run
english.segment6: To scared. to run. So scared. to run
english.segment7: Wish I had your faults. Nothing seems to phase you. Lies are much more than trust in me
english.segment8: Wish I had your faults. Wish I had your faults
